testcase.name: Verify Order submission with different payment provider
testcase.system-out: When User is on Item details page...........................................passed Then Click on Add to cart button............................................passed When user click on View cart button.........................................passed Then user should be on View cart page.......................................passed When Click on Proceed to checkout button....................................passed Then User should be on shipping Billing page................................passed Then Enter shipping address is as follows...................................passed When Click on Calculate shipping button and select shipper then Click on Payment button.passed Then select My Shipping Address is also my Billing Address radio buton......passed Then select payment provider and click on Review and Submit order button....passed When click on Submit order button...........................................passed Then User should be navigate to order submission page.......................passed
